article.title: Northrop to Repair E-2D Hawkeye Amplifier Modules
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corp., Melbourne, Florida, is being awarded $8,121,653 for ceiling price repair delivery order 7000 under previously awarded basic ordering agreement N00383-17-G-AB01 for the repair of 103 power amplifier modules in support of the E-2D Advanced Hawkeye aircraft. Work will be performed in Baltimore, Maryland, and is expected to be completed by January 2018. Fiscal 2017 working capital funds (Navy) in the amount of $3,979,610 will be obligated at time of award and will not expire at the end of the current fiscal year. This contract was a sole-source pursuant to the authority set forth in 10 U.S. Code 2304(c)(1) and Federal Acquisition Regulation 6.320-1. The Naval Supply Systems Command Weapon Systems Support, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
